text: Krasnogorsky () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Araslanovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 96 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 21 km from Meleuz, 15 km from Smakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Krasnogorsky, Republic of Bashkortostan
